results.title: Pseudoxanthoma elasticum and familial hypercholesterolemia: a deleterious combination of cardiovascular risk factors.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND AND OBJECTIVE: @<m>DISEASE_Pseudoxanthoma_Elasticum</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011561 @@@Pseudoxanthoma Elasticum@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Pseudoxanthoma_Elasticum</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011561 @@@PXE@@@), an @DISEASE_Genetic_Diseases_Inborn @DISEASE_MESH:D030342 @@@autosomal recessive disease@@@ due to mutations in @GENE_ABCC6 @GENE_368 @@@ABCC6@@@ gene, is characterised by fragmentation of elastic fibres with involvement of the cardiovascular system.

citations.NLM: Pisciotta L, Tarugi P, Borrini C, Bellocchio A, Fresa R, Guerra D, Quaglino D, Ronchetti I, Calandra S, Bertolini S. Pseudoxanthoma elasticum and familial hypercholesterolemia: a deleterious combination of cardiovascular risk factors. Atherosclerosis. 2010 May;210(1):173-6. PMID: 20018285
